byline.original: By JOHN ELIGON, JAMES BARRON and ANDY NEWMAN

abstract: The Republican political consultant accused of stealing $1.1 million from Mayor Bloomberg during the 2009 election was acquitted of the most serious charge, but the two charges of which he was convicted of are both felonies.
snippet: The Republican political consultant accused of stealing $1.1 million from Mayor Bloomberg during the 2009 election was acquitted of the most serious charge, but the two charges of which he was convicted of are both felonies.

headline.main: Consultant Guilty of Grand Larceny and Money Laundering
